import api from'./api';const newsService={// Отримати всі новини
getAllNews:()=>{console.log('Making GET /news request');return api.get('/news');},// Отримати одну новину по ID
getNewsById:id=>{console.log("Making GET /news/".concat(id," request"));return api.get("/news/".concat(id));},// Створити новину
createNews:newsData=>{console.log('Making POST /news request with data:',newsData);return api.post('/news',newsData);},// Оновити новину
updateNews:(id,newsData)=>{console.log("Making PUT /news/".concat(id," request with data:"),newsData);return api.put("/news/".concat(id),newsData);},// Видалити новину
deleteNews:id=>{console.log("Making DELETE /news/".concat(id," request"));return api.delete("/news/".concat(id));}};export{newsService};
